web_snippets: Chih-Chien Wang was born in Taiwan and lives in Montreal since completing a master's degree in the Department of Studio Arts, at Concordia University in 2002.
Born in Taiwan, Chih-Chien Wang has been living in Montreal since 2002. He obtained a BFA in Theatre and Cinema in Taipei in 1994.
